medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain, nausea, and dry heaves following a drinking binge.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started the morning after the patient's last drink. He experienced shakes and diaphoresis that improved over time. He denies having previous alcohol withdrawal episodes.
